dcterms:creator: J. Thorne
A. Vlachos
C. Christodoulopoulos
A. Mittal
dcterms:description: A modified version of the binary FEVER dataset, which includes the original instances and 1 to 25 human-created semantically similar paraphrases for each instance, consisting of 104,966 training instances and 10,444 validation instances.
dcterms:title: FEVER
